edu.um.cps2002.tile_game

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Map
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameMap, PlayerMap

    public abstract class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The Map class contains a two-dimensional array of char entries referred to as tiles and some simple methods common to both the map used by the Game class and the individual Players.
    Author:
    Luke Collins & Stefania Damato

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int size
      The dimension of the tiles array, that is, the array tiles has size size × size.
      (package private) char[][] tiles
      The char array of tiles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(int size)
      Constructor which initialises the array and sets the attribute size to the parameter size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) abstract void generate()
      This method is to be implemented by any subclass of Map and in each case, should populate the tiles array in some fashion.
      int getSize()
      Simple getter for the size attribute.
      char getTileType(int x, int y)
      Simple getter for individual tiles in the tiles array.

    • Field Detail

      • size

        int size
        The dimension of the tiles array, that is, the array tiles has size size × size.

      • tiles

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(int size)
        Constructor which initialises the array and sets the attribute size to the parameter size.
        Parameters:
        size - The desired size of the map (size × size).

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        abstract void generate()
        This method is to be implemented by any subclass of Map and in each case, should populate the tiles array in some fashion.

      • getSize

        public final int getSize()
        Simple getter for the size attribute.
        Returns:
        size - The dimension of the tiles char array.

      • getTileType

        public final char getTileType(int x,
                              int y)
        Simple getter for individual tiles in the tiles array.
        Parameters:
        x - Row in the tiles array.
        y - Column in the tiles array.
        Returns:
        The character in the xth row and yth column of the tiles array.

      • setTile

        public final void setTile(int x,
                          int y,
                          char type)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Simple setter for individual tiles in the tiles array.

        The character in the xth row and yth column of the tiles array is set to the parameter type, as long as it is equal to one of g (grass), w (water), t (treasure) or ? (undiscovered).

        Parameters:
        x - Row in the tiles array.
        y - Column in the tiles array.
        type - One of g, w, t, or ?.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Should the parameter type not be one of g, w, t, or ?.
